idea:
we are a company based in Vasai ,Mumbai,

we are manufacturers of special pre mix or also called as dry Mix mortars which are used in different stages in Building construction Industry.

Our Specialty is we are offering pre mix mortars for both Domain of the Civil Industry ie: for Industrial requirements as well as the Decorative application requirements.

following are a few types of pre mix mortars ,Dry mix Mortars manufactured by our company.

(I)  Industrial Segment:

 a) Pre coloured Plasters for interior

 b)  Pre Mix mortars for Functional Floorings for Residential/ Industrial area

 

(II) Decorative / Architectural/ Landscape, Interior Design Segment

a) Dry mix/Pre mix mortars for Architectural Precast for Fascade, GFRC     Glass Fiber Reinforced concrete, textile Reinforced concrete ,offered from 30Mpa till 120Mpa Compressive strength)
b) Premix for Architectural /Decorative Precast for Fascade/ garden furniture

c) Premix for Decorative self levelling polished concrete overlay systems for New as well as repair & restoration projects

d) Decorative Microtopping for floors & walls

e) Pre mix for Light weight concrete applications

f) Special Sealers for surface protection


There is a Huge potential for the products manufactured & offered by our company,  As we work mainly on Import substitution for the products which are currently imported from abroad at high cost, Instead we manufacture those products in India at a Affordable cost & excellent quality 

We believe in THINK GLOBALLY ACT LOCALLY"   and contribute and be a part of our nations growth story. "ATMA NIRBHAR BHARAT"

am looking forward to be associated with companies from the filed of Flooring applicators, Architects,Interior decorators, Architectural Precast companies & Digital Marketing professionals who can help us grow further in the filed
name: Tej Innovative Products

idea:
About Vocal For Local:

What started out as an idea during the middle of the pandemic, is now a business that helps many home businesses thrive and has made hundreds of people, especially women, financially independent.

Vocal for Local is an Social Commerce marketplace solely for home entrepreneurs. Started by Chaitanya Davda and Mihir Turakhia, Vocal for Local’s mission is to help provide these local entrepreneurs with a platform to turn their hobbies into a successful business venture.

On this app, you can buy anything from tasty and fresh home cooked food to homemade natural beauty products with locally sourced ingredients to even some beautiful art and handicrafts.

The app allows the entrepreneurs to set their own menu and allows flexibility of delivery (same day, next day or pre order). Mihir says “We haven't made this app keeping only sales and users in mind but also given ample of convenience and ease to sellers. If the seller is unavailable, he/she can deactivate the store with a click of a button.”

Unlike other delivery apps, Vocal For Local will deliver from anywhere across the city. You can choose to order some biryani that is 15kms away from your location, and you’ll have it at your doorstep in no time.

Chaitanya and Mihir’s vision for Vocal for Local is to expand to multiple cities (currently they are only in Mumbai), create a better buying experience for their customers by providing them with carefully curated products and wholesome food and making sure that thousands of home grown entrepreneurs get the reach and platform they deserve and eventually convert their passion into a full thriving business.
name: VOCAL FOR LOCAL PLATFORMS LLP

idea:
KAL Energy India Pvt Ltd is a Manufacturing start-up who makes  CNG Hydraulic Boosters and CNG on-line Compressors with indigenously developed technology . Besides manufacturing these products  we also provide Engineering  solutions and  O&M services for CNG Hydraulic Boosters and CNG on-line Compressors tec.  We are mainly  providing supply and services to City Gas Distribution, Oil & Gas and Energy infrastructure sectors.

 

KAL Energy combines the world’s best Compression technology having technical agreement with  DELTA COMPRESSION – (ASPRO), Argentina ( largest manufacturers of CNG Compressors globally),  RUZZA, ITALY – Renowned manufacturers of CNG Boosters and COOPER MACHINARY SERVICES – (Renowned manufacturer of high speed gas compressor) from USA for the supply of parts and services.  Having technically superior products, our products are already acceptable across CGD Sector. To name a few – Mahanagar Gas Ltd, Indraprastha Gas ltd and Gujarat Gas Ltd etc.

 

The company is owned by Mechanical Engineer backed up with excellent design engineering team who have been in the similar industry for decades.
name: KAL ENERGY INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
